languages.text: "Есть преступления, на которые нельзя закрывать глаза даже Вольным Торговцам. Помните об этом. Если Вистенца Вьятт окажется уличена в подобном проступке, вина за недосмотр за слугой будет лежать на вас".

traits.locale_text: "Есть преступления, на которые нельзя закрывать глаза даже Вольным Торговцам. Помните об этом. Если Вистенца Вьятт окажется уличена в подобном проступке, вина за недосмотр за слугой будет лежать на вас".

languages.text: "There are crimes that cannot be ignored even by a Rogue Trader. Remember this. If Vistenza Vyatt were to be proven guilty of such a transgression, the blame for overlooking her actions as a servant would fall on you."
languages.original_text: "Есть преступления, на которые нельзя закрывать глаза даже Вольным Торговцам. Помните об этом. Если Вистенца Вьятт окажется уличена в подобном проступке, вина за недосмотр за слугой будет лежать на вас".

"There are crimes that cannot be ignored even by a Rogue Trader. Remember this. If Vistenza Vyatt were to be proven guilty of such a transgression, the blame for overlooking her actions as a servant would lie on you."

"There are crimes that cannot be ignored even by a Rogue Trader. Remember this. If Vistenza Vyatt were to be proven guilty of such a transgression, the blame for overlooking her actions as a servant would fall on you."

languages.text: 「自由開拓者でさえ無視できない罪がある。覚えておけ、もしヴィステンツァ・ビャットがこの罪を犯している証拠が出れば、臣下の行いに目をつむっていた咎でお前にも矛先が向くぞ」
languages.original_text: "There are crimes that cannot be ignored even by a Rogue Trader. Remember this. If Vistenza Vyatt were to be proven guilty of such a transgression, the blame for overlooking her actions as a servant would fall on you."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者でさえ無視できない罪がある。覚えておけ、もしヴィステンツァ・ビャットがこの罪を犯している証拠が出れば、臣下の行いに目をつむっていた咎でお前にも矛先が向くぞ」

languages.original_text: "There are crimes that cannot be ignored even by a Rogue Trader. Remember this. If Vistenza Vyatt were to be proven guilty of such a transgression, the blame for overlooking her actions as a servant would fall on you."

languages.text: “即使贵为行商浪人，有些罪责也难逃其咎，不要忘记这一点。如果事实证明，维丝坦萨·维亚特真的犯下了这样的罪行，那你身为她的主人，也势必要背负监管不力的罪名。”
languages.original_text: "There are crimes that cannot be ignored even by a Rogue Trader. Remember this. If Vistenza Vyatt were to be proven guilty of such a transgression, the blame for overlooking her actions as a servant would fall on you."

traits.locale_text: “即使贵为行商浪人，有些罪责也难逃其咎，不要忘记这一点。如果事实证明，维丝坦萨·维亚特真的犯下了这样的罪行，那你身为她的主人，也势必要背负监管不力的罪名。”

languages.text: «Hay crímenes que no se pueden ignorar ni en el caso de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente. No lo olvide. Si se demuestra que Vistenza Vyatt es culpable de semejante transgresión, la culpa recaería sobre usted por hacer caso omiso a las acciones de su sirvienta».
languages.original_text: "There are crimes that cannot be ignored even by a Rogue Trader. Remember this. If Vistenza Vyatt were to be proven guilty of such a transgression, the blame for overlooking her actions as a servant would fall on you."

traits.locale_text: «Hay crímenes que no se pueden ignorar ni en el caso de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente. No lo olvide. Si se demuestra que Vistenza Vyatt es culpable de semejante transgresión, la culpa recaería sobre usted por hacer caso omiso a las acciones de su sirvienta».

languages.text: « Certains crimes ne peuvent être ignorés, même par un libre-marchand. Tâchez de ne pas l'oublier. S'il est un jour prouvé que Vistenza Vyatt s'est bien rendue coupable de ces transgressions, il vous sera reproché de l'avoir laissée faire. »
languages.original_text: "There are crimes that cannot be ignored even by a Rogue Trader. Remember this. If Vistenza Vyatt were to be proven guilty of such a transgression, the blame for overlooking her actions as a servant would fall on you."

traits.locale_text: « Certains crimes ne peuvent être ignorés, même par un libre-marchand. Tâchez de ne pas l'oublier. S'il est un jour prouvé que Vistenza Vyatt s'est bien rendue coupable de ces transgressions, il vous sera reproché de l'avoir laissée faire. »

languages.text: "Es gibt Verbrechen, die nicht einmal bei einem Freihändler ignoriert werden können. Denkt daran. Wenn Vistenza Vyatt eines solchen Verstoßes schuldig gesprochen würde, fiele die Verantwortung dafür, von ihrem Handeln als Dienerin nichts bemerkt zu haben, Euch zu."
languages.original_text: "There are crimes that cannot be ignored even by a Rogue Trader. Remember this. If Vistenza Vyatt were to be proven guilty of such a transgression, the blame for overlooking her actions as a servant would fall on you."

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt Verbrechen, die nicht einmal bei einem Freihändler ignoriert werden können. Denkt daran. Wenn Vistenza Vyatt eines solchen Verstoßes schuldig gesprochen würde, fiele die Verantwortung dafür, von ihrem Handeln als Dienerin nichts bemerkt zu haben, Euch zu."

languages.text: "Bazı suçlar vardır ki Hür Tacir bile olsan yok sayılamazlar. Bunu aklından çıkarma. Eğer Vistenza Vyatt'ın kendisine yöneltilen iddialarda suçlu olduğu ortaya çıkarsa efendisi olarak onun eylemlerine göz yumduğun için sen de suçu sayılırsın."
languages.original_text: "There are crimes that cannot be ignored even by a Rogue Trader. Remember this. If Vistenza Vyatt were to be proven guilty of such a transgression, the blame for overlooking her actions as a servant would fall on you."

traits.locale_text: "Bazı suçlar vardır ki yok sayılamazlar. Hür Tacir bile olsan. Bunu aklından çıkarma. Eğer Vistenza Vyatt'ın kendisine yöneltilen iddialarda suçlu olduğu ortaya çıkarsa, bir hizmetkârı olarak onun eylemlerine göz yumduğun için sen de suçu sayılırsın."
